author: vlad1777d
name: Glass Fedora
description:
Glass themes are based on Ambience Ubuntu 2.3, Ambience Mint 2.3, Ambience Elementary 2.5.

Themes have Cinnamon 1.8 and later versions support.

 

Installation:
Extract folder from archive into either /usr/share/themes/ (as root) or ~/.themes/ (recommended).

24.01.2013 In Fedora 18 works Policykit authentication dialog. I corrected it =)

 

Vlad.

27.09.2012

naumovvladislav@mail.ru (for any questions feel free and write me)
